mapper.sql: Id, jtid, gysbh, gysmc, gysmcjp, gyslxdh, gyslxr, gysxxdz, gysywy, gysywydh, gysywysfz, gysyzbm, gyslyxdz, gysyyzz, gysyyzzqx, gysyyzzfzrq, gysfrdb, gysjyxz, gyszczb, gysjyfs, gysscjyxkz, gysxkzmc, gysxkzdz, gysxkzbh, gysxkzfzdw, gysxkzyxq, gysxkzfzrq, gysgspzj, gysgspfzr, gysgspzjyxq, gysinfo1, gysinfo2, zt, dm
mapper.select: select from hjt_gongyingshang where dm = 0 order by gysbh asc
select from hjt_gongyingshang where dm = 0 and (gysbh like concat("%",#{gysbh},"%") or gysmc like concat("%",#{gysmc},"%"))
mapper.update: update hjt_gongyingshang set gysbh = #{gysbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysmc = #{gysmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysmcjp = #{gysmcjp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gyslxdh = #{gyslxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gyslxr = #{gyslxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysxxdz = #{gysxxdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysywy = #{gysywy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysywydh = #{gysywydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysywysfz = #{gysywysfz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysyzbm = #{gysyzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gyslyxdz = #{gyslyxdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysyyzz = #{gysyyzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysyyzzqx = #{gysyyzzqx,jdbcType=DATE}, gysyyzzfzrq = #{gysyyzzfzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, gysfrdb = #{gysfrdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysjyxz = #{gysjyxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gyszczb = #{gyszczb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysjyfs = #{gysjyfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysscjyxkz = #{gysscjyxkz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysxkzmc = #{gysxkzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysxkzdz = #{gysxkzdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysxkzbh = #{gysxkzbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysxkzfzdw = #{gysxkzfzdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysxkzyxq = #{gysxkzyxq,jdbcType=DATE}, gysxkzfzrq = #{gysxkzfzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, gysgspzj = #{gysgspzj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysgspfzr = #{gysgspfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gysgspzjyxq = #{gysgspzjyxq,jdbcType=DATE}, zt = #{zt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gysjyfw = #{gysjyfw,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, gysbz = #{gysbz,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
